titleStmt.title: The third part of No Protestant plot with observations on the proceedings upon the Bill of Indictment against the E. of Shaftsbury : and a brief account of the case of the Earl of Argyle.
No Protestant plot. Part 3
titleStmt.author: Ferguson, Robert, d. 1714.

notesStmt.note: Third part attributed to Robert Ferguson by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints. First and second parts have also been attributed to Shaftesbury by Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.)
This item also appears with "No Protestant plot" (Wing F756) at reel 143:4c.
Imperfect: copy at reel 1123:22 is stained with print show-through.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
